ai-atk-s0501a3:140_0: it is gained through joy and joy that happiness is the deathless.”
ai-atk-s0501a3:141_0: So uplifted by the happiness and joy,
ai-atk-s0501a3:141_1: In no long time, having given up sense desires in the noble ones, we will realize extinguishment.
ai-atk-s0501a3:142_0: Except in the ultimate talk, lesserating,
ai-atk-s0501a3:143_0: The expression of the two kinds of playing is finished.
